text: Erzgebirgisch (Standard German pronunciation: [ˈeːɐ̯tsɡəˌbɪʁɡɪʃ]; Erzgebirgisch: Aarzgebèèrgsch [ˈaːɰtsɡ̊əˌb̥ɛːɰjɡ̊ʃ]) is a dialect. It is spoken in the Erzgebirge in Saxony. == References == Category:German dialects Category:Languages of Germany Category:Saxony Category:Lower Saxony
title: Erzgebirgisch
